content.query:
SELECT TOP (100) [date_rep]
,[day]
,[month]
,[year]
,[cases]
,[deaths]
,[countries_and_territories]
,[geo_id]
,[country_territory_code]
,[pop_data_2018]
,[continent_exp]
,[load_date]
,[iso_country]
 FROM [ecdc_adls].[cases]

 INSERT INTO 

create schema ecdc_sql;
 create table ecdc_sql.cases (
    date_rep                   date,
    day                        smallint,
    month                      smallint,
    year                       smallint,
    cases                      smallint,
    deaths                     smallint,
    countries_and_territories  varchar(256),
    geo_id                     varchar(60),
    country_territory_code     varchar(16),
    pop_data_2018              int,
    continent_exp              varchar(32),
    load_date                  datetime2(7),
    iso_country                varchar(16))
